page.title: 15CRAFT FAIR AT HODDESDONBURY
page.content: It was a fine sunny Sunday on the 8th Sept. l985 when the 3rd Hoddesdon Craft Fair was held in the 2 barns and large garden of Home Farm, Hoddesdon- bury. Local craftsmen and women demonstrated and displayed their talents & visitors were able to buy many items. General handicrafts, needlework, crochet & knitting were on sale, also pottery & paintings. Beautiful leather bags & belts were available as folk watched the leather- worker at work. Other crafts demonstrated were basket weaving, rug weaving, copper etchings & jewellery making. A wood turner and renovator of furniture had several pieces on display. Customers were fascinated to watch a spinning wheel in use & a lady making fragrant pomanders. The organisers were delighted with the Fair's success.
